name: Preschool
description: Community Preschool implements an Inquiry Based Learning approach to curriculum that includes: Literacy, Socio-dramatic Play, Mathematics, Field Studies, Science, Creative Arts, Inquiry Based Learning encourages student voice and choice, inquiry and innovation, collaboration, creativity, critical thinking, contribution, conversation, problem solving, independence, and confidence.
